name: Forest Wander-Legend of the Blue Tree
name_original: Forest Wander-Legend of the Blue Tree
description:
Created For Cozy Fall Game Jam 2022. Game name is AKA llaFv2.  Wander the forest looking for a blue tree.  This was was a one man project minus some open source assets.  

Wanted to add a mute button and some falling leaf animations, but these were scoped out early on sadly.  There is also no end game screen/congratulation text when you finish the goal.  So think of it as a guided sandbox/walking simulator of sorts.
